name: cucumber-playwright-ts-test
description: A test project with Cucumber.js, Playwright, and TypeScript

scripts.test:chromium: cross-env BROWSER=chromium cucumber-js --format json:reports/json/chromium-desktop.json --format summary --format progress
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox cucumber-js --format json:reports/json/firefox-desktop.json --format summary --format progress
scripts.test:webkit: cross-env BROWSER=webkit cucumber-js --format json:reports/json/webkit-desktop.json --format summary --format progress
scripts.test:desktop: cross-env VIEWPORT=desktop cucumber-js --format json:reports/json/chromium-desktop.json --format summary --format progress
scripts.test:tablet: cross-env VIEWPORT=tablet cucumber-js --format json:reports/json/chromium-tablet.json --format summary --format progress
scripts.test:mobile: cross-env VIEWPORT=mobile BROWSER=webkit cucumber-js --format json:reports/json/webkit-mobile.json --format summary --format progress
scripts.test:parallel: npm-run-all --parallel test:chromium test:firefox test:webkit test:tablet test:mobile
scripts.test: yarn pretest && yarn test:parallel && yarn add-metadata && yarn report

author: shiyamtj@gmail.com
